data.comment: In the minute -1, 21559 spectators have come along to watch today.
The match is underway. Arsenal Tula have kicked-off.

A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.

Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Saint Petersburg close to the penalty box.

It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Petersburg.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?

Saint Petersburg takes a corner from the right.

Great play from Yuri Zhirkov to set up the goal.
